trans-unit.source: Contains scroll bar information

seg-source.mrk: Contains scroll bar information

target.mrk: Contains scroll bar information

trans-unit.source: Parameters

seg-source.mrk: Parameters

target.mrk: Parameters

trans-unit.source: Specifies the size, in bytes, of this structure. The caller must set this to DllStructGetSize($tagSCROLLBARINFO).

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the size, in bytes, of this structure.
The caller must set this to DllStructGetSize($tagSCROLLBARINFO).

target.mrk: Specifies the size, in bytes, of this structure.
The caller must set this to DllStructGetSize($tagSCROLLBARINFO).

trans-unit.source: Specifies the x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle coordinates of the scroll bar

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle coordinates of the scroll bar

target.mrk: Specifies the x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle coordinates of the scroll bar

trans-unit.source: Specifies the y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle coordinates of the scroll bar

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle coordinates of the scroll bar

target.mrk: Specifies the y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle coordinates of the scroll bar

trans-unit.source: Specifies the x-coordinate of the lower-right corner of the rectangle coordinates of the scroll bar

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the x-coordinate of the lower-right corner of the rectangle coordinates of the scroll bar

target.mrk: Specifies the x-coordinate of the lower-right corner of the rectangle coordinates of the scroll bar

trans-unit.source: Specifies the y-coordinate of the lower-right corner of the rectangle coordinates of the scroll bar

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the y-coordinate of the lower-right corner of the rectangle coordinates of the scroll bar

target.mrk: Specifies the y-coordinate of the lower-right corner of the rectangle coordinates of the scroll bar

trans-unit.source: Height or width of the thumb.

seg-source.mrk: Height or width of the thumb.

target.mrk: Height or width of the thumb.

trans-unit.source: Position of the top or left of the thumb.

seg-source.mrk: Position of the top or left of the thumb.

target.mrk: Position of the top or left of the thumb.

trans-unit.source: Position of the bottom or right of the thumb.

seg-source.mrk: Position of the bottom or right of the thumb.

target.mrk: Position of the bottom or right of the thumb.

trans-unit.source: Reserved.

seg-source.mrk: Reserved.

target.mrk: Reserved.

trans-unit.source: An array of DWORD elements. Each element indicates the state of a scroll bar component.

seg-source.mrk: An array of DWORD elements.
Each element indicates the state of a scroll bar component.

target.mrk: An array of DWORD elements.
Each element indicates the state of a scroll bar component.

trans-unit.source: The following values show the scroll bar component that corresponds to each array index:

seg-source.mrk: The following values show the scroll bar component that corresponds to each array index:

target.mrk: The following values show the scroll bar component that corresponds to each array index:

trans-unit.source: 0 The scroll bar itself.

seg-source.mrk: 0 The scroll bar itself.

target.mrk: 0 The scroll bar itself.

trans-unit.source: 1 The top or right arrow button.

seg-source.mrk: 1 The top or right arrow button.

target.mrk: 1 The top or right arrow button.

trans-unit.source: 2 The page up or page right region.

seg-source.mrk: 2 The page up or page right region.

target.mrk: 2 The page up or page right region.

trans-unit.source: 3 The scroll box (thumb).

seg-source.mrk: 3 The scroll box (thumb).

target.mrk: 3 The scroll box (thumb).

trans-unit.source: 4 The page down or page left region.

seg-source.mrk: 4 The page down or page left region.

target.mrk: 4 The page down or page left region.

trans-unit.source: 5 The bottom or left arrow button.

seg-source.mrk: 5 The bottom or left arrow button.

target.mrk: 5 The bottom or left arrow button.

trans-unit.source: The DWORD element for each scroll bar component can include a combination of the following bit flags.

seg-source.mrk: The DWORD element for each scroll bar component can include a combination of the following bit flags.

target.mrk: The DWORD element for each scroll bar component can include a combination of the following bit flags.

trans-unit.source: STATE_SYSTEM_INVISIBLE - For the scroll bar itself, indicates the specified vertical or horizontal scroll bar does not exist.

seg-source.mrk: STATE_SYSTEM_INVISIBLE - For the scroll bar itself, indicates the specified vertical or horizontal scroll bar does not exist.

target.mrk: STATE_SYSTEM_INVISIBLE - For the scroll bar itself, indicates the specified vertical or horizontal scroll bar does not exist.

trans-unit.source: For the page up or page down regions, indicates the thumb is positioned such that the region does not exist.

seg-source.mrk: For the page up or page down regions, indicates the thumb is positioned such that the region does not exist.

target.mrk: For the page up or page down regions, indicates the thumb is positioned such that the region does not exist.

trans-unit.source: STATE_SYSTEM_OFFSCREEN - For the scroll bar itself, indicates the window is sized such that the specified vertical or horizontal scroll bar is not currently displayed.

seg-source.mrk: STATE_SYSTEM_OFFSCREEN - For the scroll bar itself, indicates the window is sized such that the specified vertical or horizontal scroll bar is not currently displayed.

target.mrk: STATE_SYSTEM_OFFSCREEN - For the scroll bar itself, indicates the window is sized such that the specified vertical or horizontal scroll bar is not currently displayed.

trans-unit.source: STATE_SYSTEM_PRESSED - The arrow button or page region is pressed.

seg-source.mrk: STATE_SYSTEM_PRESSED - The arrow button or page region is pressed.

target.mrk: STATE_SYSTEM_PRESSED - The arrow button or page region is pressed.

trans-unit.source: STATE_SYSTEM_UNAVAILABLE - The component is disabled.

seg-source.mrk: STATE_SYSTEM_UNAVAILABLE - The component is disabled.

target.mrk: STATE_SYSTEM_UNAVAILABLE - The component is disabled.

trans-unit.source: $SIF_xxxxx and $SB_xxxxx for scrollbar require #include <WindowsConstants.au3>
